setups.conditions:
1. Clear break of structure on H1/H4
2. Wait for pullback to 50-61.8% fib zone
3. Lower timeframe confirmation (M15 BOS in direction)
setups.entry_model: Enter on M15 break of structure in direction of H4 trend after pullback
setups.stop_loss_logic: Below/above the pullback low/high + 5 pips buffer
setups.take_profit_logic: 1R at previous structure, 2R at next structure level, trail remainder

setups.conditions:
1. Price sweeps obvious liquidity (equal highs/lows)
2. Immediate rejection with displacement
3. Fair value gap left behind
setups.entry_model: Enter on retest of fair value gap after liquidity sweep

setups.conditions:
1. Clear directional bias from HTF
2. Session opens with gap or strong momentum
3. First pullback after initial move
setups.entry_model: Enter on first pullback after session open momentum
setups.notes: Session momentum setup - currently paused for review
